_header: Ye been my father by creation
_description: Song of the Virgin Mary to the Christ Child—five quatrains including refrain, ‘My owyn dyre sone lullay’, and burden: ‘Lullay my fader lullay my brother / Myn owyn dyre sone lullay‘.

Stanbr3.First Lines:
Ȝe ben my fadrer by creacion My brother ȝe ben by
                    natiuite…
Stanbr3.Last Lines:
…Ȝoure payne myn herte perchyth in tweye Myn owyn dyre
                    sone lullay
